item.description: 入门 与人相处的基本技巧 # 1. 不要批评、责怪或抱怨他人 # Don’t criticize, condemn or complain. Instead of condemnig people, let’s try to understand them. Let’s try to figure out why they do what they do. Criticism is dangerous sometimes, because it might wound a person’s pride, hurt his sense of importance, and even arouse resentment. When dealing with people, Weare dealing with creatures of emotion. 2. 诚实而真诚地赞赏他人 # Principle 2: Give honest and sincere appreciation

Ray Dalio Principles # Youtobe Video 达里奥：我在书里写了几百个原则，但我最重要的工作和生活原则主要是这5个 It’s that I’m in in a transition in my life from the second phase of my life to the thrid phase of my life. What I mean by that is that I believe that life happens in three phases. In the first phase, your life you’re dependent on others and you’re learning, you’re a student. In the second phase of your life you’re working.
